## \_getRangeByIdentifier() function

Get a range of objects

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getRangeByIdentifier<T>(originals: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, ids: ImmutableArray<unknown>, identifier: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  originals | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of objects |
|  ids | ImmutableArray&lt;unknown&gt; | An array of unique values that identify the objects |
|  identifier | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A property on the object that contains the unique value |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
